overview: With Jim’s wedding day drawing near, his friends decide to give him a bachelor bash he’ll never forget! Their formula for fun is complete whey they team up with four frisky, well-endowed strippers who’ll do anything for a good time. For Jim’s friends, it’s a debaucherous weekend of orgiastic sex for Jim, it’s a passionate farewell to the bachelor life that makes getting married worth the trouble!
title: Bodacious Ta Tas
